meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Panama.
meanings.sent1: In Panama, you can buy many things with balboas.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for balboas at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted balboas, making it a challenge to get a snack.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny balboas, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of balboas clinking together was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A type of coin used in Panama.
meanings.sent1: The souvenir shop sold beautiful balboas to tourists.
meanings.sent2: I found a rare balboa in my grandfather's old coin collection.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a balboa out of my ear during the show.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a cascade of balboas, spreading joy around the room.
meanings.sent5: The balboa gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A type of tree found in Central and South America.
meanings.sent1: The lush forest was filled with towering balboas.
meanings.sent2: I sat in the shade of a balboa tree, enjoying the cool breeze.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkeys played hide-and-seek among the balboas.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the balboa tree reached for the sky like nature's own skyscrapers.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the balboa tree flowers filled the air with sweetness.
